verses.verse: <S%H7126>Draw<s%> <S%H7126>near,<s%> O <S%H1471>nations,<s%> to <S%H8085>hear;<s%> and <S%H7181>listen,<s%> O <S%H3816>peoples!<s%> Let the <S%H776>earth<s%> and all it <S%H4393>contains<s%> <S%H8085>hear,<s%> and the <S%H8398>world<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H6631>springs<s%> from it.

For the Lord's <S%H7110>indignation<s%> is <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> And [His] <S%H2534>wrath<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> their <S%H6635>armies;<s%> He has <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> them, He has <S%H5414>given<s%> them over to <S%H2874>slaughter.<s%>

So their <S%H2491>slain<s%> will be <S%H7993>thrown<s%> out, And their <S%H6297>corpses<s%> will <S%H5927>give<s%> <S%H5927>off<s%> their <S%H889>stench,<s%> And the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> will be <S%H4549>drenched<s%> with their <S%H1818>blood.<s%>

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6635>host<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%> will <S%H4743>wear<s%> <S%H4743>away,<s%> And the <S%H8064>sky<s%> will be <S%H1556>rolled<s%> up like a <S%H5612>scroll;<s%> <S%H3605>All<s%> their <S%H6635>hosts<s%> will also <S%H5034>wither<s%> <S%H5034>away<s%> As a <S%H5929>leaf<s%> <S%H5034>withers<s%> from the <S%H1612>vine,<s%> Or as [one] <S%H5034>withers<s%> from the <S%H8384>fig<s%> <S%H8384>tree.<s%>

For My <S%H2719>sword<s%> is <S%H7301>satiated<s%> in <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold<s%> it shall <S%H3381>descend<s%> for <S%H4941>judgment<s%> upon <S%H9000>Edom,<s%> And upon the <S%H5971>people<s%> whom I have <S%H9172>devoted<s%> to <S%H4941>destruction.<s%>

The <S%H2719>sword<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H1818>blood,<s%> It is <S%H1878>sated<s%> with <S%H2459>fat,<s%> with the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of <S%H3733>lambs<s%> and <S%H6260>goats,<s%> With the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H3629>kidneys<s%> of <S%H352>rams.<s%> For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has a <S%H2077>sacrifice<s%> in <S%H1224>Bozrah,<s%> And a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2874>slaughter<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H9000>Edom.<s%>

<S%H7214>Wild<s%> <S%H7214>oxen<s%> shall also <S%H3381>fall<s%> with them, And <S%H6499>young<s%> <S%H6499>bulls<s%> with <S%H47>strong<s%> <S%H47>ones;<s%> Thus their <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H7301>soaked<s%> with <S%H1818>blood,<s%> And their <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H1878>become<s%> <S%H1878>greasy<s%> with <S%H2459>fat.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has a <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H5359>vengeance,<s%> A <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H7966>recompense<s%> for the <S%H7379>cause<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion.<s%>

And its <S%H5158>streams<s%> shall be <S%H2015>turned<s%> into <S%H2203>pitch,<s%> And its <S%H6083>loose<s%> <S%H6083>earth<s%> into <S%H1614>brimstone,<s%> And its <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H1961>become<s%> <S%H1197>burning<s%> <S%H2203>pitch.<s%>

It shall not be <S%H3518>quenched<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> or <S%H3119>day;<s%> Its <S%H6227>smoke<s%> shall <S%H5927>go<s%> up <S%H5769>forever;<s%> From <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation<s%> it shall be <S%H2717>desolate;<s%> <S%H369>None<s%> shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> through it <S%H5331>forever<s%> and <S%H5331>ever.<s%>

But <S%H6893>pelican<s%> and <S%H7090>hedgehog<s%> shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it, And <S%H3244>owl<s%> and <S%H6158>raven<s%> shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in it; And He shall <S%H5186>stretch<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> it the <S%H6957>line<s%> of <S%H8414>desolation<s%> And the <S%H68>plumb<s%> <S%H68>line<s%> of <S%H922>emptiness.<s%>

Its <S%H2715>nobles<s%> – <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H369>one<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> [Whom] they may <S%H7121>proclaim<s%> <S%H4410>king<s%> – And <S%H3605>all<s%> its <S%H8269>princes<s%> shall be <S%H657>nothing.<s%>

And <S%H9359>thorns<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> up in its <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H759>towers,<s%> <S%H7057>Nettles<s%> and <S%H2336>thistles<s%> in its <S%H4013>fortified<s%> <S%H4013>cities;<s%> It shall also be a <S%H5116>haunt<s%> of <S%H8565>jackals<s%> [And] an <S%H2681>abode<s%> of <S%H3284>ostriches.<s%>

And the <S%H9478>desert<s%> <S%H9478>creatures<s%> shall <S%H6298>meet<s%> with the <S%H338>wolves,<s%> The <S%H9617>hairy<s%> <S%H8163>goat<s%> also shall <S%H7121>cry<s%> to its <S%H7453>kind;<s%> <S%H389>Yes,<s%> the <S%H3917>night<s%> <S%H3917>monster<s%> shall <S%H7280>settle<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> And shall <S%H4672>find<s%> herself a <S%H4494>resting<s%> <S%H4494>place.<s%>

The <S%H7091>tree<s%> <S%H7091>snake<s%> shall <S%H7077>make<s%> its <S%H7077>nest<s%> and <S%H4422>lay<s%> [eggs] <S%H8033>there,<s%> And it will <S%H1234>hatch<s%> and <S%H1716>gather<s%> [them] under its <S%H6738>protection.<s%> <S%H389>Yes,<s%> the <S%H1772>hawks<s%> shall be <S%H6908>gathered<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> <S%H802>Every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> with its <S%H7468>kind.<s%>

<S%H1875>Seek<s%> from the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and <S%H7121>read:<s%> Not <S%H259>one<s%> of <S%H2007>these<s%> will be <S%H5737>missing;<s%> <S%H802>None<s%> <S%H3808><s%> will <S%H6485>lack<s%> its <S%H7468>mate.<s%> For His <S%H6310>mouth<s%> has <S%H6680>commanded,<s%> And His <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> has <S%H6908>gathered<s%> them.

And He has <S%H5307>cast<s%> the <S%H1486>lot<s%> for them, And His <S%H3027>hand<s%> has <S%H2505>divided<s%> it to them by <S%H6957>line.<s%> They shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it <S%H5704>forever<s%><S%H5769>;<s%> From <S%H1755>generation<s%> to <S%H1755>generation<s%> they shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in it.
